Title: The Keys to Starting and Adapting Your Product with Marie Forleo
Description:
Join us as our host, George Kamel, talks to Marie Forleo. She’s a CEO, entrepreneur, speaker, bestselling author, creator of MarieTV and host of The Marie Forleo Podcast. She shares how to overcome your inner critic, launch before you’re ready, and make adjustments along the way. Later in the episode, George chats with Brendan Wovchko, the chief technology officer of Ramsey Solutions, about how to use iteration as a strategy to deliver value early so your customers get the help they need.

 

You’ll learn:

  • How to deal with imposter syndrome as a leader
  • The low-risk way to launch something new
  • The key to continual product improvement
  • What iteration actually looks like
